page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW
page.content: { { The block is a mixture of{housing}and {industrial complexes.}The housing is generally modern, post 1950. The industrial complexes are generally fuel and chemical complexes, because of the closeness of the{River Thames. {Texaco}have a large fuel depot here, as do{British Gas. London and Coastal {Wharves}also have a depot here, and they store a variety of chemicals, all brought in by sea. There is a safe haven here for large heavy ships, and each company has its own private jetty, so that ships can safely discharge their cargoes. There is also some{farming,}mainly corn growing, although some hay is also grown. There is also the oldest{pub}on Canvey to be found close to the sea wall.
